doc.title: The New Serpentine and Fire Dance
doc.plot: This film is a decided novelty. L'Argentine, the famous fire dancer, is seen battling with the flames which finally devour her. She fights hard, however, to maintain her supremacy, during which time the most gorgeous effects are obtained on the screen. This film is furnished in colors when so ordered for an additional sum of $7.50. We furnish it plain however when not otherwise ordered. Gorgeous.
